docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, June 4(AP)--Juan Isaac Cooke, Foreign Minister of Argentina under  former President Juan D. Peron, tied in exile last night of a heart attack. He was stricken while motoring from Punta del Este to Montevideo. He was 61 years old....
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, June 4(AP)--Juan Isaac Cooke, Foreign Minister of Argentina under former President Juan D. Peron, tied in exile last night of a heart attack. He was stricken while motoring from Punta del Este to Montevideo. He was 61 years old. Peron himself is in refugee in Venezuela.

headline.main: JUAN ISAAC COOKE, PERON AIDE, DEAD; Argentine Foreign Minister; 1945-46, Served Later as Permanent U. N. Delegate Stated Loyalty to Peron

docs.snippet: WIMBLEDON, England, June 25--Althea Gibson, the girl picked to carry on the twentyyear tradition of American supremacy here, is still in the allEngland tennis championships-- just barely.
docs.lead_paragraph: WIMBLEDON, England, June 25--Althea Gibson, the girl picked to carry on the twentyyear tradition of American supremacy here, is still in the allEngland tennis championships-- just barely.

headline.main: Althea Gibson Is Pressed to Win at Wimbledon; SEVEN U.S. GIRLS VICTORS IN TENNIS Miss Gibson and Mrs. Knode Advance With Difficulty-- Shea Bows to Emerson

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, June 26-- Three of Argentina's major political parties have made formal demands on the Government to call off the elections it has scheduled for July 28.
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, June 26-- Three of Argentina's major political parties have made formal demands on the Government to call off the elections it has scheduled for July 28.
docs.abstract: 3 major parties protest July 28 election plan; Uruguay repts proof Peron has been organizing revolution; interns 15 supporters

docs.snippet: When the United Nations committee of inquiry on Hungary sent in its report a week ago yesterday our own State Department declared that the report merited "the most immediate and close study by all governments."
docs.lead_paragraph: When the United Nations committee of inquiry on Hungary sent in its report a week ago yesterday our own State Department declared that the report merited "the most immediate and close study by all governments."

docs.snippet: A sizable chunk of American surplus tonnage-some 700,000 deadweight tons of war-built shipping-may be taken out of storage and sold to foreign registry.
docs.lead_paragraph: A sizable chunk of American surplus tonnage-some 700,000 deadweight tons of war-built shipping-may be taken out of storage and sold to foreign registry.
docs.abstract: Cong weighs bills to sell 77 ships to 7 nations
